## whoami
I was born in [Guayaquil, Ecuador](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guayaquil) ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¨ and now live in [Minneapolis, MN](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minneapolis) with my wife, two kids, and a cat. I primarily work as a native Android and iOS developer but also spend some time doing frontend and backend development.
